inclusion.criterion: Patients of both sexes aged > 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cytological or histological diagnosis of bladder cancer
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Multiple primary or recurrent Ta G1-G2 papillary cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to comply with the protocol for the duration of the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensitivity to Paclitaxel or one of its constituents
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: T1 papillary cancer or muscle-invasive disease (T2-T4)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone XRT, which may be a contraindication for intravesical therapy.
